headline: Caterpillar Kicks Off its Next 100 Years of Innovation and Industry Leadership
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE: CAT) today marked its 100th anniversary with celebrations throughout the U.S. that commemorate a monumental moment in the company's history. The iconic manufacturing company officially turns 100 on April 15, marking a century of customer-centric innovation and industry-leading transformation.

headline: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT) Is a Trending Stock: Facts to Know Before Betting on It
summary: Zacks.com users have recently been watching Caterpillar (CAT) quite a bit. Thus, it is worth knowing the facts that could determine the stock's prospects.
